description: Security: GCP Audit - Looks for GCP actions that, while not inherently suspicious or abnormal, are sourcing from a geolocation (city) that is unusual. This can be the result of compromised credentials or keys.

detectors.detector_description: Detects rare GCP Audit event actions for a city.

custom_settings.security_app_display_name: Unusual City for a GCP Audit action
